# Raymundo Eduardo Pilz 
<br>

::: {.home-intro}
I am a *Statistics* student at the Federal University of Paraná (**[UFPR](https://ufpr.br/)**). I am deeply passionate about developing statistical concepts and transforming raw data into valuable insights.

With a bachelor's degree in *Accounting* from the University of West Santa Catarina (**[UNOESC](https://www.unoesc.edu.br/)**), I possess the skill to translate numbers into compelling narratives. Specializing in providing in-depth reports detailing financial and operational impacts, I offer users profound insights that drive decision-making.
